sentences.sentence: There was no board and no way to win-and those weirdly shaped dice looked confusing.
sentences.translation: 没有棋盘，也没有具体的赢的方法——还有那些形状古怪的骰子看起来也让人摸不着头脑。

sentences.sentence: To start a new search, you have to click a button called, weirdly, "Reset Constraints."
sentences.translation: 要开始新的搜索，必须点击一个叫做“重设限制”的奇怪按钮。
